# Fantasy Event Landing Page - Vue.js Project

This is a Vue.js project for a fantasy-themed event landing page with responsive design for both mobile and desktop platforms.

## Project Overview

- **Framework**: Vue.js 3 with Composition API
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS for responsive design
- **Routing**: Vue Router for section navigation
- **Audio**: HTML5 Audio API integration
- **Deployment**: Firebase Hosting
- **Theme**: Fantasy sections (Fantástico e Juir, Sobre, Pirata e Sereia, Princese, Fades, Sátiro e Fauno, Vampiros, Bruxas)

## Development Guidelines

- Use composition API for components
- Implement responsive design patterns
- Follow Vue.js best practices
- Ensure cross-browser compatibility
- Optimize for mobile-first approach

## Project Structure

```
src/
├── components/     # Reusable components
├── views/         # Page components
├── router/        # Vue Router configuration
├── assets/        # Static assets (images, audio)
├── styles/        # Global styles
└── App.vue        # Main application component
```

## Key Features to Implement

- Responsive navigation menu
- Themed content sections
- Audio playback controls
- Smooth transitions between sections
- Mobile hamburger menu
- Firebase hosting setup
